import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const AM = () => { const [loanAmount, setLoanAmount] = useState(); const [loanYears, setLoanYears] = useState(); const [loanMonths, setLoanMonths] = useState(); const [interestRate, setInterestRate] = useState(); const [payment, setPayment] = useState(0); const handleClick = () => { } return (

Loan amount

setLoanAmount(parseFloat(e.target.value))} />

Loan term in years

setLoanYears(parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
or

Loan term in months

setLoanMonths(parseFloat(e.target.value))} />

Interest rate per year

setInterestRate(parseFloat(e.target.value))} />

Show amortization schedule

${payment}
Monthly Payments
Total Principal Paid
$5,000
Total Interest Paid
$5,000
) } export default AM;
